text:
Thank you very much to the owner, Adrian for being so flexible and accommodating for accepting my son into his centre 2 months before his N exams. Today his mathematics results just came out and done very well. Waiting for his O-level combine science papers now.

A big shout out to all the teachers of Star Achievers for all your hard work. Thank you very much.

The Center team are very helpful and fast speed in answering all my questions enquires.
The teachers are very dedicated and really knowledgeable and know how to help my gal in her studies.

My gal did improve the  Maths subject after the 9 months of attending the tuition Center lesson.

Kudos to the teacher effort and help.

I will recommend this Center if your kids need help in their studies.☺️

Thank u !!

The tutors are not only knowledgeable but also approachable, often taking the time to greet students individually and create a relaxed learning environment. For instance, I struggled alot in secondary school with science and english. One of my tutors, Mr Tan, patiently explained it multiple times until I understood it. He also made himself available outside of class hours for additional guidance, which greatly improved my grasp of the subjects and gave me the confidence to do well in my O levels. His support has significantly enhanced my learning experience, making me feel valued and encouraged as a student.

My son is having his tuition here. Adrian shows great patience for slower learners like my son who has just come from a foreign country. Engages parents to do home work together with son, ensuring a total learning experience. My son now speaks basic English fluently, and I hope he can continue to learn from Adrian.

I have sent my three children here for about 7-8 years already. I’ve seen their grades skyrocket from a few lessons! My youngest, 12, who took her PSLE this year told me that the strategies and techniques taught were really useful in her exams! I recommend this place for anyone who is looking for a fun learning experience, all while able to learn something new.
